snippet: Activist filmmakers in Cairo have released a series of Web videos urging their fellow citizens to reject a new constitution hastily approved last month by Islamist allies of President Mohamed Morsi.
abstract: Activist filmmakers in Cairo have released a series of Web videos urging their fellow citizens to reject a new constitution hastily approved last month by Islamist allies of President Mohamed Morsi.

headline.main: Video Bloggers Urge Egyptians to Reject Constitution

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
